Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Black Claw stationed at the Arena of Defiance and in Feral Valley have been attacking anyone who goes by that area.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:41#4004#Black Claw berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:41#4005#Black Claw slaughterers} and {@LinkCreature:41#3006#Black Claw blood fighters}.

Report to Coordinator Glasrinne when mission is complete.
You’ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven’t completed your mission yet.
